com.Lumension.android.permission_scanner

Class UpdateDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.Lumension.android.permission_scanner.UpdateDB

  • public class UpdateDB
extends java.lang.Object
    A singleton class which contains the fake database of white/black lists as well as update information

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static UpdateDB getInstance()
        Gets the UpdateDB instance
        Returns:
        The single instance of the UpdateDB

      • addEntry

        public void addEntry(java.lang.String packageName,
            DBEntry.LISTED listed)
        Adds a database entry with a listing value or adds listed status to existing entry
        Parameters:
        packageName - package name of the application to be listed
        listed - listed value of the application (WHITE/BLACK/NOT)

      • addEntry

        public void addEntry(java.lang.String packageName,
            int version,
            int threat,
            java.lang.String description)
        Adds a database entry for a specific update or adds update to existing entry
        Parameters:
        packageName - package name of the application
        version - the out-dated version code
        threat - numeric threat value associated with this out-dated version
        description - a description of the purpose of the update

      • checkForUpdates

        public java.util.List<android.util.Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String>> checkForUpdates(Application app)
        Gets a list of updates for a specific application
        Parameters:
        app - the application to check for updates
        Returns:
        List of missing updates from the database (consisting of a threat value and description) or null if list is empty

      • findList

        public DBEntry.LISTED findList(Application app)
        Gets white/black listed status of an application from the database
        Parameters:
        app - Application to check for listed status
        Returns:
        LISTED.BLACK if app is black listed, LISTED.WHITE if app is white listed and up-to-date, LISTED.NOT if app is unlisted or is white listed but missing updates
